short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your HarnessNation experience with these client-side add-ons and fixes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HarnessNation+ provides a suite of enhanced functionality useful to any HarnessNation player. What's new in version 3.8? * Training Center Copy Tool * Settings Popup For more information, visit https://github.com/tfrizzell/harnessnation-plus/wiki/Features
